summary: Tattoos for CBBEv3 vanilla, slim, and hip-compatibility version
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://tarpontech.biz/images/ladypaint.jpg[/img]

[color=red]
UNP forthcoming in an update later this week

[/color]

Just a little ink for the ladies.  

The download contains 20 body texture files, maybe you\'ll find one you like.

I\'ve also included the layered photoshop .psd file as a separate download so you\'re welcome to play with it and make something unique.

[color=red]
This mod is not NMM friendly, manual installation only.  
[/color]

Sorry folks, trying to make an installer with 60 individual files was simply too cumbersome.  
The instructions are simple enough, if you have trouble just send me a PM and I\'ll try to point you in the right direction.



[color=yellow]
-----------------------------------
[b]Installation Instructions:[/b]
-----------------------------------
[/color]
1.  Extract the contents somewhere.

2.  Use an image viewer ( I recommend Infranview ) to find the ink you like.

3.  Rename the file to [color=red] femalebody_1.dds [/color]

4.  Place the file into the appropriate folder, remembering to backup your         original body texture first.

From your main Skyrim installation directory, the path to success is:

[color=yellow]/skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/female/[/color]



[color=yellow]
-----------------------------------
[b]Notice:[/b]
-----------------------------------
[/color]
All art used was believed to be in the public domain, if a copyright infringing work is discovered I will happily remove it.
author: Chidosity
